name: NeedForVentilator
title: Need for Ventilator
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes related to procedures which indicate a need for a ventilator.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have had an procedure demonstrating a need for a ventilator. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes representing a procedure showing a need for a ventilator using the ICD 10 PCS code system.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
